articles.title: British lawyer claims he killed fox with baseball bat while wearing wife's kimono, sparks backlash, investigation
articles.description: A prominent lawyer in London sparked viral fame – and an investigation – after he tweeted on Boxing Day that he had killed a fox with a baseball bat while wearing a kimono.
articles.content:
A prominent lawyer in London has sparked viral fame – and an investigation – after he tweeted on December 26th that he had killed a fox with a baseball bat while wearing a kimono.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: ‘Mame,’ ‘Hello, Dolly!’ composer Jerry Herman dead at 88
articles.description: Tony Award-winning composer Jerry Herman, who wrote the cheerful, good-natured music and lyrics for such classic shows as "Mame," "Hello, Dolly!" and "La Cage aux Folles," died Thursday. He was 88.
articles.content:
Tony Award-winning composer Jerry Herman, who wrote the cheerful, good-natured music and lyrics for such classic shows as "Mame," "Hello, Dolly!" and "La Cage aux Folles," died Thursday. He was 88.
